title: Starlight Boys
overview: iQIYI's first original talent show a global male idol audition! Here, dazzling teenagers from all over the world gather to receive professional training at Starlight Academy, crossing the boundaries of language and culture, and igniting the stage with their talent and passion. Through fierce competition and teamwork, they will compete for the opportunity to become a globally recognized super idol. Let's witness how they are born from the starlight and become trendsetting stars!Â
